name: Accel Class
description:
A class, in a particular school, of a particular retro town, The Accel Class. 

Join Yuki, Felix, Mike, and Malcolm as they face struggles and hardships in the so-called acceleration class. Delve into their everyday life as students in a failing class, trying to uphold their grades through any means necessary… even if it takes them through physical conflict and acts of stealing.

Our social media: https://www.instagram.com/jcafe_vn/
